title: Thermodynamic Cognitive Homeostasis (TCH): A Subjective Physics Approach to Self-Regulating AI
description: Code and data for the article 'Thermodynamic Cognitive Homeostasis (TCH): A Subjective Physics Approach to Self-Regulating AI'. The software is released under the MIT license. The accompanying article (if separately published) may be licensed under CC-BY-4.0.
